abstract: Republicans are months away from voting, but the Obama campaign already is trying to define Mitt Romney as a shape-shifter.
snippet: Republicans are months away from voting, but the Obama campaign already is trying to define Mitt Romney as a shape-shifter.
lead_paragraph: 5:51 p.m. | Updated Republicans are months away from their first presidential primaries and caucuses, but the Obama campaign already is giving Mitt Romney the nominee treatment -- trying to define him irrevocably as a shape-shifter, with an eye to the 2012 election.

headline.main: Obama Campaign Treating Romney Like Nominee - By Attacking
